summary.body: I seem to have thrown away everything except my card for the Association membership, but I thought that it entitled you to a 10% discount at the Waterside Cafe.  I very rarely go there but did today and the girl at the counter was dismissive of the card ("what ess zeeiss?"  in a non-specific European accent) then saying "only orange ones" presumably meaning the Barbican card for the theatre etc.  I was ready just to pay up but suddenly she gave a shrug of the shoulders and applied a discount.   Anyway, what's the story on discounts - the website does not see to mention it.
summary.subject: Barbican Association Discounts?

summary.body: Can anyone clarify whether the  "two for one" Sunday evening discount is still in operation? Last Sunday I was initially told I could only buy the tickets half an hour before the film although after asking the employee to check this she sold me the tickets there & then without checking! This week I was told that the discount had stopped. On asking the staff memeber to check I was told it hadn't but that I couldn't have it on "The Da Vinci Code"! I seem to get a different response every Sunday........... Thanks, Semi
summary.subject: Barbican Association Sunday cinema discount
